TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_281<tab>By completing categories in your challenge log you will occasionally attract new recruits to your squadron.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_282<tab>The appearance of potential recruits will be announced with an on-screen message, and their enlistment papers will be delivered to your desk inside the barracks.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_283<tab>You can also check if recruits are available by opening the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Timers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_284<tab>Visit the barracks and read the enlistment papers to decide which recruits you wish to add to your squadron.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_290<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_291<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_292<tab>You can decide if you wish to add a new recruit to your squadron after selecting the respective enlistment form.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_100_292<tab>Should your squadron roster already contain the maximum eight members, then you will need to discharge an existing member in order to enlist a new recruit.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_290<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_291<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_301<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>Squadron missions are duties that have been assigned to your adventurer recruits by the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var>. To undertake a mission, you must select four squadron members for deployment.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_301<tab>Each mission requires that you pay your recruits a number of company seals and takes 18 hours (Earth time) to complete.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_302<tab>The time remaining until a mission is completed can be viewed by opening the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Timers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_303<tab>Speak with your squadron sergeant to begin deployments and confirm mission results.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_304<tab>Each duty can be completed once per week, with all mission timers and respective strength requirements being reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_302<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_312<tab>Training courses will improve your squadron's attributes as a unit, providing increases to overall physical, mental, and tactical strength.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_313<tab>The focus on which squadron attribute is improved varies from course to course, so consider the values required for completing the more difficult missions when planning a regimen for your recruits.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_314<tab>Each training course takes 1 hour to complete (Earth time). The time remaining until a course is completed can be viewed by opening the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Timers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_315<tab>View the regimen board to commence courses and confirm the results of squadron training.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_316<tab>You can order your squadron to train up to three times a day. This limit is reset every day at <var 06 06 /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_310<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_311<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_310<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_311<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_310<tab>The total value of squadron attributes is subject to a maximum limit. Once this maximum has been reached, any attempt to raise a certain attribute will result in the reduction of another.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_311<tab>Maximum attribute values can be increased by improving your squadron rank, which is accomplished by successfully completing special missions.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_320<tab>Changing the class of your squadron members requires you to first be in possession of the specific squadron-related item.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_321<tab>Once you have the item required, check the regimen board and select the option to “View squadron roster.” Next, choose a squadron member, and use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Change Class<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand to switch to the desired class.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_010_330<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_010_331<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_330<tab>Upon returning from a mission, a squadron member will occasionally exhibit a preference for a certain squadron composition.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_331<tab>This “squadron chemistry” can affect the outcome of missions by improving attributes or increasing rewards, and its bonuses will come into play when meeting certain requirements. Requirements vary, but generally involve deploying a squadron composed of a certain combination of classes or races.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_332<tab>Chemistry settings are accessed via the regimen board by selecting “View squadron roster,” then using the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Confirm Chemistry<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand after choosing a squadron member.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_333<tab>Simply exhibiting a chemistry preference provides no bonuses. Should you deploy a squadron on their next mission without first activating any available chemistry options, the bonuses will disappear without effect.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_340<tab>The “Mission Affinity” window displays a random prerequisite for select missions. By deploying members of the suggested class or race, the effects of squadron chemistry will be amplified.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_341<tab>Meeting affinity prerequisites can also greatly improve your squadron's chances of completing the more difficult duties, so be sure to take this information into consideration when deciding which members to deploy.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_010_342<tab>Affinity prerequisites are attached to all routine and priority missions, and are reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_021_000_GRD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_340<tab>Command missions are duties that put you at the head of a four-man unit─yourself and three soldiers─for a foray into an instanced dungeon.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_341<tab>The unit must comprise one tank, one healer, and two DPS.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_342<tab>While unit members have their own free will, responding as the situation demands, they can be given orders to guide their actions.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_343<tab>There are three types of orders: Engage, Disengage, and Execute Limit Break. These can be issued via a dedicated hotbar.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_344<tab>Engage tells your unit to attack the targeted enemy.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_345<tab>Disengage tells your unit to break off combat and regroup near you.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_346<tab>While Disengage is in effect, it will be replaced with the order Re-engage.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_347<tab>The Disengage status can be lifted by issuing either the Engage or Re-engage order.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_348<tab>Execute Limit Break tells your unit to perform a level 1 limit break.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_349<tab>Even if the limit gauge is two bars full, only one bar will be consumed.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_350<tab>Orders can also be set to your other hotbars by selecting them from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Orders<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface found within <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Actions & Traits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_351<tab>Speak with your squadron sergeant to undertake command missions and confirm mission results.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_360<tab>Battle tactics govern unit members' behavior during a command mission.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_361<tab>Initially, only the tactic Independent is available, but more will be learned as you complete missions.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_362<tab>Other tactics include Offensive, Balanced, and Defensive. Each directs a unit member's behavior while offering unique enhancing effects.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_363<tab>These effects receive boosts as you complete missions and gain in tactics mastery.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_364<tab>Battle tactics can be set ahead of a mission. To do so, speak with your soldiers in the barracks and select Display Orders.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_370<tab>You can cast glamours on the equipment of squadron members level 51 or above. To do so, speak with them and select Cast Glamour.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_371<tab>You will be prompted to select an item in your inventory to lend its appearance. Though the process requires a catalyst, your gear will be retained.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_100<tab>Welcome to the squadron barracks, Commander! I've been fully debriefed on this new initiative, and stand ready to answer any questions you might have.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_136<tab>First and foremost, however, we'll need to increase the number of squadron members. We have three recruits at present, but our squadron won't be ready to deploy until we have at least four.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_137<tab>Your own deeds as an adventurer should serve to attract new recruits. All you need to do is choose from the hopefuls who submit their enlistment papers.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_138<tab>By completing categories in your challenge log you will occasionally attract new recruits to your squadron.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_139<tab>You can decide which recruits you wish to add to your squadron after visiting the barracks and reading the enlistment papers.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>You can also check if recruits are available by opening the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Timers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_141<tab>Visit the barracks and read the enlistment papers to decide which recruits you wish to add to your squadron.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_010_110<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_010_111<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_101<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_110<tab>Ah, our fledgling squadron's first deployment!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_111<tab>Now, ordinarily I would offer you a list of pre-approved duties to choose from, but I've taken the liberty of arranging a simple mission to ease the recruits into their roles.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_112<tab>All you need to do is confirm the squadron members and give the signal to deploy.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_113<tab>Squadron missions must be undertaken by a unit comprised of four members. Choose the recruits you deem suitable for the mission, and then select the “Deploy” button.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_120<tab>The order has been given, Commander: the squadron is mission-bound. ...Ah, I should also mention that each deployment is funded by company seals.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_121<tab>I've paid what's owed this time around, but the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var> requires that their soldiers receive fair compensation. For future deployments, you'll need to pay the recruits yourself, Commander.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_122<tab>And now we wait. Once the squadron has returned from their mission, speak to me and I'll provide you with a full report.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_124<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_125<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_126<tab>Speak to the squadron sergeant to confirm the results of a mission.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_123<tab>Squadron missions require 18 hours to complete (Earth time). The time remaining until a mission is completed can be viewed by opening the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Timers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_130<tab>Let's see here... Aye, the recruits appear to have carried out their task in a sufficiently competent manner. You'd be surprised at how many privates manage to lose their way on a simple patrol route...
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_131<tab>In any case, a small success like this will improve the unit's cohesion and help sharpen their individual skills.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_132<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_133<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_134<tab>Speak directly with the squadron sergeant to begin mission deployments or check mission reports.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_135<tab>Each mission can be completed once per week, with deployment status being reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_010_136<tab>Now let's talk training. Specialized instruction will improve the abilities of individual recruits, but its main purpose is to encourage the growth of the squadron as a whole.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_010_137<tab>When you decide that the squadron's skills could use some sharpening, check the regimen board for a list of available training courses.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_010_138<tab>Aye, as much as I champion learning through doing, there are some things that need to be taught if the troops are to handle the tougher deployments. “The more ye bleed durin' trainin' the less ye'll bleed on the field!” as my old drill sergeant used to say...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_010_139<tab>If we want this squadron to be the most elite unit in the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var> then we'd best not neglect their military education!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_150<tab>Our squadron has been improving by leaps and bounds, but I think it's time for the recruits to try their hands at a more challenging deployment. It's the only way they'll learn to push past their limits.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_151<tab>One or more squadron members have reached level 20, unlocking a special promotion mission. Successfully completing this mission will increase your squadron's rank.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_152<tab>Due to the high difficulty level of the promotion mission, however, it is advised that you first improve your squadron members' individual attributes as much as possible before attempting a deployment.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_160<tab>Congratulations, Commander! Thanks to your canny leadership, our squadron has proved itself yet again. The higher ups will be throwing some meatier assignments our way now, just you wait and see!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_161<tab>Your squadron has attained Rank Two! As well as trainee missions, you will now have access to the higher difficulty “routine missions.”

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_162<tab>You have also received a copy of <var 1A 02 /var>Contemporary Warfare: Defense<var 1A 01 /var> as a reward for completing the promotion mission. This special item allows you to change a squadron member's class.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_163<tab>Check the regimen board and select the option to “View squadron roster.” Next, choose a squadron member, and use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Change Class<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand to switch to the desired class.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_170<tab>Are you keeping an eye on squadron chemistry, Commander? It's surprising how much better the recruits perform when teamed with members that complement or challenge them.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_171<tab>Relationships within a squadron can shift like the winds, though, so pray take that into consideration before ordering a deployment.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_172<tab>Upon returning from a mission, a squadron member will occasionally exhibit a preference for a certain squadron composition.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_173<tab>This “squadron chemistry” can affect the outcome of missions by improving attributes or increasing rewards, and its bonuses will come into play when meeting certain requirements. Requirements vary, but generally involve deploying a squadron composed of a certain combination of classes or races.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_174<tab>Chemistry settings are accessed via the regimen board by selecting “View squadron roster,” then using the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Confirm Chemistry<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> subcommand after choosing a squadron member.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_175<tab>Simply exhibiting a chemistry preference provides no bonuses. Should you deploy a squadron on their next mission without first setting a chemistry effect, the bonus will disappear without effect.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_180<tab>I can hardly recognize those green recruits we started with, Commander. In fact, I've heard rumors making the rounds in <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom Command)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((the Adders' Nest)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((the Hall of Flames)) (()) /var> that our squadron is on the short list for the next big assignment...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_181<tab>One or more squadron members have reached level 40, unlocking a special promotion mission. Successfully completing this mission will increase your squadron's rank.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_182<tab>Due to the exceedingly high difficulty of the promotion mission, however, it is advised that you first improve your squadron members' individual attributes as much as possible before attempting a deployment.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_190<tab>A close call by all accounts, but the squadron has returned safely from its deployment! Not everyone comes back from a mission like that, and the accolades have been flooding in from our sister companies. You should be proud, Commander!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_191<tab>Your squadron has attained Rank Three! You now have access to the higher difficulty “priority missions.”
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_192<tab>Completing priority missions earns you special rewards, so be sure to deploy your squadron on these challenging duties.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_193<tab>Be aware, however, that a successful completion will lock access to other priority missions until the timer resets.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_194<tab>Priority mission status is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_195<tab>...Ah, and before I forget: there was one other matter to which we must attend.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_196<tab>We've received a missive from <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom Command)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((the Adders' Nest)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((the Hall of Flames)) (()) /var> regarding your performance. If you'll permit me...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_197<tab><var 1A 02 /var>For outstanding efforts in the Adventurer Squadron initiative, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> is hereby promoted to <var 08 E1E93501 ((first storm lieutenant)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((first serpent lieutenant)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((first flame lieutenant)) (()) /var>. Effective immediately.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_198<tab>A letter of promotion! Congratulations, Commander! And very well deserved, I must say!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_330<tab>We've received a missive from <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom Command)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((the Adders' Nest)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((the Hall of Flames)) (()) /var>. If you'll permit me...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_331<tab><var 1A 02 /var>For ongoing excellence in the Adventurer Squadron initiative, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>'s squadron is hereby granted authorization to undertake command missions. Effective immediately.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_332<tab>Well, an expansion of our sphere of activity! This is proof positive of the company's faith in us, Commander.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_333<tab>Conversely, it also means that expectations run higher. Let us set about our task with renewed vigor and continue on our exemplary course!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_334<tab>You now have access to command missions. These duties put you at the head of a four-man unit─yourself and three soldiers─for a foray into an instanced dungeon.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_335<tab>Command missions may be undertaken by speaking with the squadron sergeant. Successful completion may yield unique rewards.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_336<tab>If you wish to know more, please refer to the squadron guide.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_210<tab>The squadron has returned from their deployment. Pray look over the report, Commander.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_220<tab>...Ah, and before I forget: there was one other matter to which we must attend.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_221<tab>We've received a missive from <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom Command)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((the Adders' Nest)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((the Hall of Flames)) (()) /var> regarding your performance. If you'll permit me...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_222<tab><var 1A 02 /var>For outstanding efforts in the Adventurer Squadron initiative, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> is hereby promoted to <var 08 E1E93501 ((first storm lieutenant)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((first serpent lieutenant)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((first flame lieutenant)) (()) /var>. Effective immediately.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_223<tab>A letter of promotion! Congratulations, Commander! And very well deserved, I must say!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_230<tab>Greetings, Commander. The squadron is eager to receive your next orders!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_240<tab>Greetings, Commander. The squadron is performing well, but let's keep up the pace! How shall we proceed? Mission deployment or training?

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_250<tab>We have three eager recruits, but we need to enlist at least one more member before we can call ourselves a squadron. Let's get this barracks filled, Commander!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_251<tab>Your own deeds as an adventurer should serve to attract new recruits─all you need to do is choose from the hopefuls who submit their enlistment papers.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_252<tab>By completing categories in your challenge log you will occasionally attract new recruits to your squadron.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_260<tab>Have you given any thought to training? Specialized instruction will improve the abilities of individual recruits, but its main purpose is to encourage the growth of the squadron as a whole.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_261<tab>When you decide that the squadron's skills could use some sharpening, check the regimen board for a list of available training courses.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_262<tab>Aye, as much as I champion learning through doing, there are some things that need to be taught if the troops are to handle the tougher deployments. “The more ye bleed durin' trainin' the less ye'll bleed on the field!” as my old drill sergeant used to say...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_263<tab>If we want this squadron to be the most elite unit in the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var> then we'd best not neglect their military education!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_320<tab>Commander. Our squadron appears to be gaining a solid reputation within the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Flames)) (()) /var>.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_321<tab>Expectations are high, and I think it's time we deployed the troops on a mission that truly tests the limits of their capabilities.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_322<tab>A special promotion mission is currently available in the list of routine missions. Successfully completing this mission will increase your squadron's rank.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_100<tab>Welcome to the squadron barracks, Commander! I've been fully debriefed on this new initiative, and stand ready to answer any questions you might have.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_136<tab>First and foremost, however, we'll need to increase the number of squadron members. We have three recruits at present, but our squadron won't be ready to deploy until we have at least four.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_137<tab>Your own deeds as an adventurer should serve to attract new recruits. All you need to do is choose from the hopefuls who submit their enlistment papers.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_110_110<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_110_111<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_101<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_110<tab>Ah, our fledgling squadron's first deployment!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_111<tab>Now, ordinarily I would offer you a list of pre-approved duties to choose from, but I've taken the liberty of arranging a simple mission to ease the recruits into their roles.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_112<tab>All you need to do is confirm the squadron members and give the signal to deploy.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_120<tab>The order has been given, Commander: the squadron is mission-bound. ...Ah, I should also mention that each deployment is funded by company seals.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_121<tab>I've paid what's owed this time around, but the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var> requires that their soldiers receive fair compensation. For future deployments, you'll need to pay the recruits yourself, Commander.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_122<tab>And now we wait. Once the squadron has returned from their mission, speak to me and I'll provide you with a full report.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_124<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_125<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_130<tab>Let's see here... Aye, the recruits appear to have carried out their task in a sufficiently competent manner. You'd be surprised at how many privates manage to lose their way on a simple patrol route...
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_131<tab>In any case, a small success like this will improve the unit's cohesion and help sharpen their individual skills.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_132<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_133<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_110_137<tab>When you decide that the squadron's skills could use some sharpening, check the regimen board for a list of available training courses.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_110_138<tab>Aye, as much as I champion learning through doing, there are some things that need to be taught if the troops are to handle the tougher deployments. “The more ye bleed durin' trainin' the less ye'll bleed on the field!” as my old drill sergeant used to say...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_110_139<tab>If we want this squadron to be the most elite unit in the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var> then we'd best not neglect their military education!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_150<tab>Our squadron has been improving by leaps and bounds, but I think it's time for the recruits to try their hands at a more challenging deployment. It's the only way they'll learn to push past their limits.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_160<tab>Congratulations, Commander! Thanks to your canny leadership, our squadron has proved itself yet again. The higher ups will be throwing some meatier assignments our way now, just you wait and see!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_170<tab>Are you keeping an eye on squadron chemistry, Commander? It's surprising how much better the recruits perform when teamed with members that complement or challenge them.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_171<tab>Relationships within a squadron can shift like the winds, though, so pray take that into consideration before ordering a deployment.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_263<tab>If we want this squadron to be the most elite unit in the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var> then we'd best not neglect their military education!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_320<tab>Commander. Our squadron appears to be gaining a solid reputation within the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Flames)) (()) /var>.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_321<tab>Expectations are high, and I think it's time we deployed the troops on a mission that truly tests the limits of their capabilities.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_100<tab>Welcome to the squadron barracks, Commander! I've been fully debriefed on this new initiative, and stand ready to answer any questions you might have.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_136<tab>First and foremost, however, we'll need to increase the number of squadron members. We have three recruits at present, but our squadron won't be ready to deploy until we have at least four.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_137<tab>Your own deeds as an adventurer should serve to attract new recruits. All you need to do is choose from the hopefuls who submit their enlistment papers.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_210_110<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_210_111<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_101<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_110<tab>Ah, our fledgling squadron's first deployment!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_111<tab>Now, ordinarily I would offer you a list of pre-approved duties to choose from, but I've taken the liberty of arranging a simple mission to ease the recruits into their roles.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_112<tab>All you need to do is confirm the squadron members and give the signal to deploy.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_120<tab>The order has been given, Commander: the squadron is mission-bound. ...Ah, I should also mention that each deployment is funded by company seals.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_121<tab>I've paid what's owed this time around, but the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var> requires that their soldiers receive fair compensation. For future deployments, you'll need to pay the recruits yourself, Commander.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_122<tab>And now we wait. Once the squadron has returned from their mission, speak to me and I'll provide you with a full report.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_124<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_125<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_130<tab>Let's see here... Aye, the recruits appear to have carried out their task in a sufficiently competent manner. You'd be surprised at how many privates manage to lose their way on a simple patrol route...
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_131<tab>In any case, a small success like this will improve the unit's cohesion and help sharpen their individual skills.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_132<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_133<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_210_136<tab>Now let's talk training. Specialized instruction will improve the abilities of individual recruits, but its main purpose is to encourage the growth of the squadron as a whole.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_210_137<tab>When you decide that the squadron's skills could use some sharpening, check the regimen board for a list of available training courses.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_210_138<tab>Aye, as much as I champion learning through doing, there are some things that need to be taught if the troops are to handle the tougher deployments. “The more ye bleed durin' trainin' the less ye'll bleed on the field!” as my old drill sergeant used to say...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_210_139<tab>If we want this squadron to be the most elite unit in the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var> then we'd best not neglect their military education!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_150<tab>Our squadron has been improving by leaps and bounds, but I think it's time for the recruits to try their hands at a more challenging deployment. It's the only way they'll learn to push past their limits.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_160<tab>Congratulations, Commander! Thanks to your canny leadership, our squadron has proved itself yet again. The higher ups will be throwing some meatier assignments our way now, just you wait and see!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_170<tab>Are you keeping an eye on squadron chemistry, Commander? It's surprising how much better the recruits perform when teamed with members that complement or challenge them.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_171<tab>Relationships within a squadron can shift like the winds, though, so pray take that into consideration before ordering a deployment.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_180<tab>I can hardly recognize those green recruits we started with, Commander. In fact, I've heard rumors making the rounds in <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom Command)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((the Adders' Nest)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((the Hall of Flames)) (()) /var> that our squadron is on the short list for the next big assignment...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_190<tab>A close call by all accounts, but the squadron has returned safely from its deployment! Not everyone comes back from a mission like that, and the accolades have been flooding in from our sister companies. You should be proud, Commander!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_195<tab>...Ah, and before I forget: there was one other matter to which we must attend.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_196<tab>We've received a missive from <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom Command)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((the Adders' Nest)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((the Hall of Flames)) (()) /var> regarding your performance. If you'll permit me...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_197<tab><var 1A 02 /var>For outstanding efforts in the Adventurer Squadron initiative, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> is hereby promoted to <var 08 E1E93501 ((first storm lieutenant)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((first serpent lieutenant)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((first flame lieutenant)) (()) /var>. Effective immediately.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_198<tab>A letter of promotion! Congratulations, Commander! And very well deserved, I must say!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_330<tab>We've received a missive from <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom Command)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((the Adders' Nest)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((the Hall of Flames)) (()) /var> regarding your performance. If you'll permit me...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_331<tab><var 1A 02 /var>For ongoing excellence in the Adventurer Squadron initiative, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>'s squadron is hereby granted authorization to undertake command missions. Effective immediately.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_332<tab>Well, an expansion of our sphere of activity! This is proof positive of the company's faith in us, Commander.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_333<tab>Conversely, it also means that expectations run higher. Let us set about our task with renewed vigor and continue on our exemplary course!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_210<tab>The squadron has returned from their deployment. Pray look over the report, Commander.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_220<tab>...Ah, and before I forget: there was one other matter to which we must attend.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_221<tab>We've received a missive from <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom Command)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((the Adders' Nest)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((the Hall of Flames)) (()) /var> regarding your performance. If you'll permit me...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_222<tab><var 1A 02 /var>For outstanding efforts in the Adventurer Squadron initiative, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> is hereby promoted to <var 08 E1E93501 ((first storm lieutenant)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((first serpent lieutenant)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((first flame lieutenant)) (()) /var>. Effective immediately.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_223<tab>A letter of promotion! Congratulations, Commander! And very well deserved, I must say!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_230<tab>Greetings, Commander. The squadron is eager to receive your next orders!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_240<tab>Greetings, Commander. The squadron is performing well, but let's keep up the pace! How shall we proceed? Mission deployment or training?

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_250<tab>We have three eager recruits, but we need to enlist at least one more member before we can call ourselves a squadron. Let's get this barracks filled, Commander!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_251<tab>Your own deeds as an adventurer should serve to attract new recruits─all you need to do is choose from the hopefuls who submit their enlistment papers.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_260<tab>Have you given any thought to training? Specialized instruction will improve the abilities of individual recruits, but its main purpose is to encourage the growth of the squadron as a whole.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_261<tab>When you decide that the squadron's skills could use some sharpening, check the regimen board for a list of available training courses.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_262<tab>Aye, as much as I champion learning through doing, there are some things that need to be taught if the troops are to handle the tougher deployments. “The more ye bleed durin' trainin' the less ye'll bleed on the field!” as my old drill sergeant used to say...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_263<tab>If we want this squadron to be the most elite unit in the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order of the Twin Adder)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Immortal Flames)) (()) /var> then we'd best not neglect their military education!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_320<tab>Commander. Our squadron appears to be gaining a solid reputation within the <var 08 E1E93501 ((Maelstrom)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((Order)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((Flames)) (()) /var>.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_321<tab>Expectations are high, and I think it's time we deployed the troops on a mission that truly tests the limits of their capabilities.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_006_001_LIM<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_006_001_GRD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_006_001_ULD<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_400<tab>Commander, the Adders' Nest has sent a new mission our way. I've read the briefing, and it's a tough one. But if we can pull it off... Well, let's just say I think we'll be in for a commendation.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_401<tab>By successfully completing command missions at five different locations, you have gained access to a special “flagged mission.”

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SYSTEM_000_402<tab>Due to the exceedingly high difficulty of this mission, however, it is advised that you first improve your squadron members' individual attributes as much as possible before attempting a deployment.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_410<tab>Congratulations, Commander! I knew our squadron was up to the task, but there's nothing quite so satisfying as seeing “Mission Successful” at the top of a report.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_411<tab>Seems we have a visitor... Come in!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_412<tab>(-???-)I trust I've found the barracks of Lieutenant <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> and <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> squadron?
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_413<tab>Serpent Marshal Brookstone! To what do we owe this honor?

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_414<tab>I heard word the lieutenant had just returned from <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> mission, and I wished to speak with our decorated hero in person.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_415<tab>These are trying times, as you well know, but the valor shown by you and your troops is a source of inspiration for the entire company.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_416<tab>Taking your exemplary service into consideration, we've decided that a moment of recognition is long overdue. Ahem.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE_000_417<tab><var 1A 02 /var>For outstanding efforts in the Adventurer Squadron initiative, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> is hereby promoted to <var 08 E1E93501 ((storm captain)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((serpent captain)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((flame captain)) (()) /var>. May your deeds be guided by the will of the elementals.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_418<tab>What did I tell you! I knew a promotion was in the offing. And what an honor that our squadron's success merited a personal visit from the serpent marshal himself!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_000_419<tab>Congratulations again, Commander. You've proven once again that with the right leadership, this squadron is capable of anything!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_400<tab>Commander, the Maelstrom higher-ups have sent a new mission our way. I've read the briefing, and it's a tough one. But if we can pull it off... Well, let's just say I think we'll be in for a commendation.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_410<tab>Congratulations, Commander! I knew our squadron was up to the task, but there's nothing quite so satisfying as seeing “Mission Successful” at the top of a report.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_411<tab>Seems we have a visitor... Come in!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_100_412<tab>(-???-)Greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I hope I'm not interrupting anything important.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_413<tab>Storm Marshal Slafyrsyn! To what do we owe this honor?

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_100_414<tab>I'd heard the lieutenant here had returned from <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> mission, and I wished to speak with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> in person.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_100_415<tab>As you well know, there is much to trouble a soldier's heart in these trying times. Yet the valor shown by you and your troops is a constant source of inspiration for many in the Maelstrom.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_100_416<tab>And after speaking with my colleagues, we've decided that a little recognition for your efforts is long overdue. A moment, if you will...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_EYNZAHRSLAFYRSYN_100_417<tab><var 1A 02 /var>For outstanding efforts in the Adventurer Squadron initiative, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> is hereby promoted to <var 08 E1E93501 ((storm captain)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((serpent captain)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((flame captain)) (()) /var>. May your deeds see the Maelstrom through the rough seas ahead.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_418<tab>What did I tell you! I knew a promotion was in the offing. And what an honor that our squadron's success merited a personal visit from the storm marshal himself!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_100_419<tab>Congratulations again, Commander. You've proven once again that with the right leadership, this squadron is capable of anything!

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_400<tab>Commander, the Hall of Flames has sent a new mission our way. I've read the briefing, and it's a tough one. But if we can pull it off... Well, let's just say I think we'll be in for a commendation.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_410<tab>Congratulations, Commander! I knew our squadron was up to the task, but there's nothing quite so satisfying as seeing “Mission Successful” at the top of a report.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_411<tab>Seems we have a visitor... Come in!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_STILLRIVER_200_412<tab>(-???-)Lieutenant <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>? Good, I thought I'd wandered into the wrong barracks for a moment there.
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_413<tab>Flame Marshal River! To what do we owe this honor?

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_STILLRIVER_200_414<tab>I'd heard the lieutenant here had returned from <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> mission, and wanted a word with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> in person.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_STILLRIVER_200_415<tab>As you well know, the world's seen some tough times and there's more lurkin' up ahead. But you and your squadron, well, you've been the inspiration that many soldiers need to carry on.

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_STILLRIVER_200_416<tab>I've gone over it with my peers in the Hall of Flames, and we reckon it's high time you were recognized for your efforts. A little quiet, if you will...

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_STILLRIVER_200_417<tab><var 1A 02 /var>For outstanding efforts in the Adventurer Squadron initiative, <var 2B ((<var 08 E1E93501 ((<var 28 ((GCRankLimsaMaleText)) E93509 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((<var 28 ((GCRankGridaniaMaleText)) E93609 /var>)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((<var 28 ((GCRankUldahMaleText)) E93709 /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var> is hereby promoted to <var 08 E1E93501 ((storm captain)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93601 ((serpent captain)) (()) /var><var 08 E1E93701 ((flame captain)) (()) /var>. May your fire burn ever bright and steady.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_418<tab>What did I tell you! I knew a promotion was in the offing. And what an honor that our squadron's success merited a personal visit from the flame marshal himself!
TEXT_COMARMGCARMYOFFICER_00342_PLATOONINSTRUCTOR_200_419<tab>Congratulations again, Commander. You've proven once again that with the right leadership, this squadron is capable of anything!
